title: Obsessive-Compulsive Personality Disorder
description: A comprehensive guide to Obsessive-Compulsive Personality Disorder, including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Obsessive-Compulsive Personality Disorder is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Personality Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
